Descriptions: During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which regenerate your characters' Energy.
Whenever you sprint, an unstable blob of energy will drop that explodes after 1s. Can occur once every 10s. Store up to 3 at one time.
During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which regenerate your characters' Energy.
Whenever you sprint, an unstable blob of energy will drop that explodes after 1s. Can occur once every 10s. Store up to 3 at one time.
During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which regenerate your characters' Energy.
Whenever you sprint, an unstable blob of energy will drop that explodes after 1s. Can occur once every 10s. Store up to 3 at one time.
During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which regenerate your characters' Energy.
Whenever you sprint, an unstable blob of energy will drop that explodes after 1s. Can occur once every 10s. Store up to 3 at one time.
During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which regenerate your characters' Energy.
Whenever you sprint, an unstable blob of energy will drop that explodes after 1s. Can occur once every 10s. Store up to 3 at one time.
During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which regenerate your characters' Energy.
Whenever you sprint, an unstable blob of energy will drop that explodes after 1s. Can occur once every 10s. Store up to 3 at one time.
Auras that increase your characters' Shield Strength will occasionally appear during the battle.
When your character's Stamina is above 50%, a shockwave will be released upon attacking an opponent. Can occur once every 10s.
Auras that increase your characters' Shield Strength will occasionally appear during the battle.
When your character's Stamina is above 50%, a shockwave will be released upon attacking an opponent. Can occur once every 10s.
During the battle, Auras will occasionally appear which increase your characters' Normal ATK SPD and DMG.

Your character gains increased DMG after rapidly attacking an opponent with Normal or Charged Attacks within a short time. This effect lasts for 1s and can stack up to 10 times, with a 50% chance of causing a shockwave when a stack is added.
While protected by a shield, Character ATK +50%

When Crystallize occurs, the elemental shard obtained by the character deals Elemental DMG to surrounding opponents. Increased DMG is dealt when the shield is more powerful. DMG dealt scales based on Shield Strength.
When a character protected by a shield is hit, it causes an energy explosion, dealing DMG to surrounding opponents. Can only occur once every 4s. DMG dealt scales based on Shield Strength.
When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created from a Crystallize Reaction between Geo and Cryo, a shockwave will be released, dealing DMG to surrounding opponents.
When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created from a Crystallize Reaction between Geo and Cryo, Elemental Skill CD is decreased by 1s.

When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created from a Crystallize Reaction between Geo and Cryo, gain 5% increased ATK, 5% increased ATK SPD, and 4% increased Movement SPD. This effect lasts for 20s, and has a maximum of 5 stacks.
When a character obtains an Elemental Shard created from a Crystallize Reaction between Geo and Cryo, gain 8% increased CRIT Rate. This effect lasts for 20s, and has a maximum of 5 stacks.
When active character's HP is less than 70%, ATK is increased by 20% and ATK SPD is increased by 15%.
When active character's HP is less than 35% and they are under the protection of a shield, CRIT Rate is increased by 20% and CRIT DMG is increased by 40%.

A Charge will accumulate every 10s, with a maximum of three existing at any one time. If the active character's HP is less than 50%, they will consume a Charge when they hit an opponent to create an unstable energy orb at the opponent's position. This orb will explode after 1s, and only one of them can be created every 2s.

When the active character's HP is less than 50%, they gain a 2% DMG Bonus for 10s after hitting an opponent. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and each character in the party will have their own independent stacks and durations. Each time the stack count or duration of this effect resets, there is a 50% chance to release an Energy Blast. An Energy Blast can be triggered once every 10s.

Characters possess an ATK-increasing Windward Aura that can increase their ATK by a maximum of 60%. For every opponent who steps within the Aura, the Aura's effect is decreased by 25%. When 4 or more opponents are within the Aura, this effect will not provide an ATK increase.
Hitting an opponent with a Plunging Attack decreases their DEF by 40% for 10s.

When a character scores consecutive hits on an opponent with Normal Attacks within 2s, this character's Physical DMG is increased by 5% for 10s. This effect stacks up to 5 times, and only 1 stack is added at a time regardless of how many enemies are hit in one strike. When 5 stacks have been obtained, further hits on opponents will unleash shockwaves that deal AoE DMG. A shockwave can be created in this manner once every 1s.
A backlash will occur when opponents hit a character protected by a shield, unleashing a shockwave that deals AoE DMG. Can occur once every 6s.

When a character scores Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack hits that deal Physical DMG to opponents, this character's CRIT Rate is increased by 3% for 10s. This effect stacks up to 5 times, and only 1 stack is added at a time regardless of how many enemies are hit in one strike. When 5 stacks have been obtained, CRIT Hits on opponents will unleash shockwaves that deal AoE DMG. A shockwave can be created in this manner once every 1s.

When an active character triggers a Swirl reaction on a nearby opponent, they will trigger a shockwave at that opponent's position that deals AoE DMG. A shockwave can be triggered in this manner once every 3.5s.
When an active character triggers a Swirl reaction on a nearby opponent, they will regenerate 4 Energy for all characters in the party. This effect can be triggered once every 3.5s.

When an active character triggers a Swirl reaction on nearby enemies, a Brumous Aura that lasts 8s will be left at the location of the Swirl reaction. Deals damage to enemies inside the Aura every 2s. A Brumous Aura can only be generated once every 9s.

When an active character's Elemental Energy is fully charged, the DEF of opponents hit by the character's Normal, Charged or Plunging Attacks will be decreased by 7% for 10 seconds. Max 5 stacks. Each stack has an independent duration.

When an active character obtains an Elemental Orb or Elemental Particle, the character will unleash a shockwave that deals DMG to surrounding opponents. This kind of shockwave can be unleashed once every 4s.
After unleashing an Elemental Burst, the ATK of every character in the party will be increased by 20% for 10s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack has an independent duration.

After a character uses an Elemental Burst, all party members' ATK is increased by 6.5% for 15s. Maximum 7 stacks. When 7 stacks are reached, the active character's Normal Attacks will unleash a shockwave at the position of the opponent it hits, dealing AoE DMG. A shockwave can be unleashed in this manner once every 2s.

For 10s after a character uses an Elemental Burst, that character's Normal and Charged Attacks will unleash a shockwave at the position of the opponent they hit at the cost of 1% of the character's HP, dealing AoE DMG. This effect will be cleared when this character leaves the field. A shockwave can be unleashed in this manner once every 1s. Active characters can go down as a result of this HP loss.

After the challenge begins, when a character's Elemental Energy is greater than or equal to 50%, they will gain a 6.5% ATK Bonus every second. Max 10 stacks. When a character's Elemental Energy is less than 30%, the ATK Bonus gained this way will be cleared.

After the challenge begins, when a character's Elemental Energy is 100%, they will gain 1 stack of Auspice every second. Max 10 stacks. When this character unleashes their Elemental Burst, all Auspice stacks will be cleared, and the DMG dealt by this character will be increased by 5% for each stack cleared for the next 10s. While the character is enjoying the DMG Bonus gained via this method, they cannot gain any more stacks.

After the challenge begins, when the active character's Elemental Energy is greater than or equal to 50%, they will continuously release shockwaves that deal DMG to opponents. When their Elemental Energy reaches 100%, these shockwaves will deal even greater DMG.

You will obtain 1 Extract stack after obtaining a shard created through the Crystallize reaction, which will increase the DMG dealt by your active character by 8% for 10s. Max 3 stacks. When characters possessing 3 stacks obtain more Crystallize reaction-created shards, they will unleash a shockwave that deals True DMG to opponents. Shockwaves created this way can occur every 3s.
When there is a Geo construct near your active character, your Charged Attacks deal 30% more DMG and the Stamina they consume is decreased by 50%.

When a character deals Elemental DMG to opponents with a Normal ATK, Charged ATK, Plunging ATK, Elemental Skill, or Elemental Burst, all party members gain 10% Bonus DMG for that element, and will gain 10% more Bonus DMG every 3s until they obtain 100% Bonus Elemental DMG through this Blessing of the Abyssal Moon. When a character deals a different type of Elemental DMG to an opponent this way, the previous Elemental DMG Bonus gained will reset.

When the active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents multiple times within 2s, that character's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 5% for 8s. Max 15 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s and will be cleared if the character goes down or leaves the field.

When the active character hits opponents with attacks that are considered Normal Attack DMG, there is a 50% chance of unleashing a shockwave at the hit opponent's position, dealing AoE True DMG. One shockwave can be released in this way every 0.3s.

When the active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents multiple times within 2s, the character gains a stack of Emergence for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Emergence will be cleared when the character goes down or leaves the field. When the character gains 15 Emergence stacks, the stacks will be cleared and a shockwave will be unleashed that deals True DMG to nearby opponents. After a shockwave is unleashed in this way, all party members will deal 25% increased DMG for 10s.

When opponents take <color=#F39000FF>Electro-Charged DMG</color>, their Electro RES decreases by <color=#F39000FF>10%</color> for 10s. Max <color=#F39000FF>4</color> stacks. Each stack's duration is independent. Each enemy can receive this effect once every 1.2s.

When the active character's Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts hit an opponent affected by <color=#F39000FF>Electro</color>, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave is created</color> at that opponent's position, dealing True DMG. A shockwave may be produced in this manner every 2s.

After a character's Normal Attack hits an opponent, this opponent will be afflicted with a Mark of Ending. After 10s, this Mark of Ending will be removed, dealing True DMG to this opponent. When a character's Normal Attack hits an opponent <color=#F39000FF>with a Mark of Ending</color>, the DMG dealt by the Mark of Ending's removal will be increased. This DMG can be increased <color=#F39000FF>9</color> times.

After a character's Normal Attacks hit opponents, the DMG dealt by this character's Normal Attacks will increase by <color=#F39000FF>12%</color> for 5s. This effect can stack up to <color=#F39000FF>5</color> times. Each stack is calculated independently. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s.

After a character's Normal Attack deals DMG to an opponent, the Physical/Elemental RES of this opponent will <color=#F39000FF>decrease by 6%</color> for 5s, matching the type of DMG dealt. This can stack up to <color=#F39000FF>7</color> times. RES decreases of different types can co-exist, and their stacks and timers will be independent of each other.

After a character's Normal Attack hits an opponent, this opponent will be afflicted with a Mark of Ending. After 10s, this Mark of Ending will be removed, dealing True DMG to this opponent. When a character's Normal Attack hits an opponent <color=#F39000FF>with a Mark of Ending</color>, the DMG dealt by the Mark of Ending's removal will be increased. This DMG can be increased <color=#F39000FF>9</color> times.
After the active character uses an Elemental Skill, <color=#F39000FF>Normal Attack DMG is increased by 16%</color> for 8s. Max 3 stacks. Stacks are counted independently.

After a character's Elemental Skill hits an opponent, that opponent's <color=#F39000FF>Physical and All Elemental RES will be decreased by 12%</color> for 8s. Max 3 stacks. Stacks are counted independently.

After the active character uses an Elemental Skill, that character's next Normal Attack that hits an opponent will <color=#F39000FF>unleash a shockwave</color> at that opponent's position, dealing True DMG. This effect can occur once every 1.2s.

When a character takes the field, they will gain 1 Fortitude stack every 2s. This will <color=#F39000FF>increase their ATK by 20%</color>. Max 3 stacks. When characters with 3 Fortitude stacks hit opponents with Charged Attacks, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the opponents' position, dealing True DMG. A shockwave can be unleashed in this manner once every 2s. When the character leaves the field, all their Fortitude stacks will be cleared.
When a character triggers Swirl on an opponent, that opponent's <color=#F39000FF>DEF is decreased by 12%</color> for 10s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

After the active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks hit opponents, that character's <color=#F39000FF>Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 12%</color> for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect will be cleared if the character leaves the field.

After characters deal DMG to opponents with a Dendro Core (including Burgeon and Hyperbloom), their <color=#F39000FF>ATK will be increased by 15%</color> for 8s. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and can be triggered once every 0.1s.
When a character triggers Quicken on an opponent, that opponent's <color=#F39000FF>DEF is decreased by 35%</color> for 10s after they are affected by the reaction.

After a character triggers Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon, all party members will have their <color=#F39000FF>Elemental Mastery increased by 40</color> for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 5 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.
After opponents take DMG from Dendro Cores (this includes Burgeon and Hyperbloom DMG), their <color=#F39000FF>All Elemental and Physical RES will decrease by 8%</color> for 6s. Max 4 stacks.

When Dendro Core attacks (this includes Burgeon and Hyperbloom attacks) hit an opponent, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at that opponent's position, dealing True DMG. A shockwave can be unleashed this way every 2s.

When characters deal DMG to an opponent, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at that opponent's position, dealing True DMG. Each Elemental DMG Type (including Physical DMG) can unleash a shockwave this way every 8s.

When characters trigger Burning, Quicken, Aggravate, Spread, Bloom, Hyperbloom, or Burgeon on an opponent, all party members will gain <color=#F39000FF>10% Dendro DMG Bonus</color> for 10s. This bonus can be triggered once every 5s. Max 4 stacks. Once 4 stacks have been gained, when characters deal Dendro DMG to an opponent, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at that opponent's position, dealing True DMG. A shockwave can be unleashed in this way once every 5s.

After the active character's Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attack deals DMG to an opponent, the character will gain a <color=#F39000FF>10% corresponding Elemental or Physical DMG Bonus of that attack</color> for 4s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s. Max 6 stacks. It will be removed when the character leaves the field or deals a different type of Elemental or Physical DMG.

After the active character triggers a Swirl reaction, all party members will have their <color=#F39000FF>CRIT DMG increased by 20%</color> for 8s. Max 3 stacks. This effect can be triggered once every 1s.

When the active character deals consecutive instances of Elemental DMG of the same Elemental Type using Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts to an opponent, they will gain 1 count stack. 1 stack can be gained every 1s. After 5 stacks have been gained, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the opponent's position, dealing True DMG and clearing all heretofore accumulated stacks. Should the active character leave the field or deal a different type of Elemental DMG, these stacks will also be cleared. Dealing Physical DMG will not clear the stacks.
The <color=#F39000FF>Dendro RES and Electro RES will be decreased by 30%</color> for opponents that are under the Quickened state. This effect will be removed 2s after the Quickened state ends.

After a character deals Dendro DMG to opponents through Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill, or Elemental Burst, the character will gain one stack of Verdant Vigor: <color=#F39000FF>DMG dealt by the character will be increased by 8%</color> for 6s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 6 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

When a character triggers a Spread or Aggravate reaction on an opponent, <color=#F39000FF>a shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the opponent's position, dealing True DMG. A shockwave can be unleashed this way every 3s.

After a character's HP decreases, all party members will gain a stack of Implacable: <color=#F39000FF>DMG dealt will be increased by 8%</color> for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. Max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

When a character's HP decreases, <color=#F39000FF>release a shockwave</color> at the current active character's position, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

When the active character's HP decreases, <color=#F39000FF>a shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the character's position, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents. This effect can be triggered once every 0.8s.

After a character triggers a Bloom reaction, all characters' <color=#F39000FF>Bloom, Hyperbloom, and Burgeon DMG dealt is increased by 35%</color> for 6s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 4 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

When DMG dealt by Dendro Cores (including DMG from Hyperbloom and Burgeon reactions) hits a character, <color=#F39000FF>Elemental Mastery will be increased by 200</color> for all characters in the party for 4s.

After the character's Normal Attack hits an opponent, this opponent will be afflicted with a Sign of Snaring. After 3s, the Sign will be removed, dealing True DMG to this opponent. After a character's Normal Attack hits an opponent <color=#F39000FF>with a Sign of Snaring</color>, the DMG dealt by the Sign's removal will be increased. This DMG can be increased for no more than 9 times.

After the active character's Normal Attacks hit opponents, the DMG dealt by this character will increase by <color=#F39000FF>12%</color> for 2s. This effect can stack up to <color=#F39000FF>5</color> times. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect can be triggered once every 0.05s. This effect will be canceled when the character leaves the field.

After the character's Normal Attack hits an opponent, the Physical or Elemental RES of this opponent will <color=#F39000FF>decrease by 6%</color> for 2s, matching the Attribute of that attack. This can stack up to <color=#F39000FF>6</color> times. RES decreases of different types can co-exist, and their stacks and timers will be independent of each other.

Within 10s after the character enters the field, the character's <color=#F39000FF>Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will deal 30% increased DMG. Their ATK SPD will also be increased by 10%</color>. This effect will be canceled when the character leaves the field.

When a character loses or restores HP, all party members will gain <color=#F39000FF>7.5% increased ATK</color> for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 4 stacks. Each stack will be counted independently.

When the active character deals consecutive instances of Elemental DMG of the same Elemental Type or Physical DMG using Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks to an opponent, they will gain 1 count stack. 1 stack can be gained every 0.3s. The stacks for every Elemental and Physical DMG will be counted independently. After 6 stacks have been gained, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the opponent's position, dealing True DMG and clearing all previously accumulated stacks for this DMG type. Should the active character leave the field, these stacks will be cleared.

When a character recovers HP, that character gains <color=#F39000FF>10% increased ATK</color> for 10s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack will be counted independently. When a character loses HP, that character gains <color=#F39000FF>40 Elemental Mastery</color> for 10s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack will be counted independently. The effects from recovering and losing HP are independent from each other, and stacks are counted independently.
When a character recovers or loses HP, that character gains <color=#F39000FF>40% increased All Elemental and Physical DMG</color> Bonus for 3s.

When the character's HP increases or decreases, their <color=#F39000FF>Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG will be increased by 16%</color> for 6s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. Max 3 stacks.

After the character's Charged Attack hits an opponent, the character will receive <color=#F39000FF>a 20% Elemental or Physical DMG Bonus</color>, corresponding to the Elemental or Physical DMG type of the Charged Attack, for 5s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s. Max 3 stacks. Charged Attack DMG bonuses from different Elemental types or Physical DMG are counted independently.

After the active character's Normal or Charged Attack hits an opponent, that character's <color=#F39000FF>Normal and Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 6%</color> for 5s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 5 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect will be cleared if the character leaves the field.

When a character's HP increases or decreases, it will be counted. When it reaches a total of 12, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the character's position, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents and clearing the count. 1 such shockwave can be unleashed every 4s.

When off-field characters deal Elemental Skill DMG to an opponent, an Uncanny Mark will be placed upon that opponent. When another active character hits a marked opponent with an attack of the same Elemental Type, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at that opponent's position, dealing True DMG. The Uncanny Mark lasts 5s, and Marks created through different attacks with different Elemental Types can exist independently. 1 such shockwave can be unleashed every 2s. When a character enters the field, the Uncanny Marks placed by that character on opponents will be removed.

After a character takes the field, they will gain one stack of Soar every 2.5s. Each stack will <color=#F39000FF>increase the DMG dealt by this character by 8%</color>. Max 3 stacks. A character with 3 stacks will <color=#F39000FF>unleash a shockwave</color> at an opponent's position when they deal DMG to that opponent, dealing True DMG. This effect will be cleared when the character leaves the field. 1 such shockwave can be unleashed every 1s.

After a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by the Crystallize reaction, they will gain the Redoubtable state. Active characters in this state <color=#F39000FF>deal 15% increased DMG</color>. This state lasts for 8s and can stack up to 3 times, with the duration of each stack counted independently.

After a character obtains an Elemental Shard created by the Crystallize reaction, it will be counted. When the count reaches 3, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be released</color> at the character's location, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents, and resetting the count. 1 such shockwave can be triggered every 6s.

When a character receives healing, it will be counted. When the count reaches a total of 16, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave will be unleashed</color> at the character's position, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents and clearing the count. 1 such shockwave can be unleashed every 8s.

After the active character's Plunging Attacks hit opponents, the character's <color=#F39000FF>Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 20%</color> for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. This effect will be cleared if the character leaves the field.

After the active character's Plunging Attacks hit opponents, <color=#F39000FF>unleash a shockwave</color> at the character's location, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents. 1 such shockwave can be unleashed every 2s.
When characters create Geo Constructs, <color=#F39000FF>unleash a shockwave</color> at the character's location, dealing True DMG to nearby opponents. 1 such shockwave can be unleashed every 6s.

When a character deals Geo DMG to an opponent, this instance will be counted for the character. 1 count can be gained every 0.1s. When the count reaches 3, this character will receive a Gravel Mark, granting them <color=#F39000FF>50% Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

After a character triggers a Swirl reaction, all party members' <color=#F39000FF>Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 20%</color> for 10s. This effect can be triggered once every 0.1s. Max 3 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently.

When a character triggers Vaporize, Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Burgeon, Pyro Swirl, or Pyro Crystallize reactions on an opponent, the opponent's <color=#F39000FF>All Elemental RES and Physical RES is reduced by 30%</color> for 4s.
When a character receives healing, the character's <color=#F39000FF>ATK increases by 50%</color> for 3s.

When a character's HP value increases or decreases, that character gains a <color=#F39000FF>16% increased All Elemental and Physical DMG Bonus</color> for 8s. This effect can stack up to 3 times, and the duration of each stack is counted independently.

For 10s after the active character uses their Elemental Skill, <color=#F39000FF>DMG dealt by their Normal Attacks is increased by 20%</color>, and a tally will be kept when this character's Normal Attacks hit opponents. The tally can increase by 1 up to once every 0.1s, and once it reaches 3, a <color=#F39000FF>shockwave is unleashed</color> at the opponent's location that deals True DMG to nearby opponents, and the tally will be reset. Up to 1 shockwave can be unleashed this way every 1.5s, and the effect and tally are cleared when the character leaves the field.
After this character receives healing, their <color=#F39000FF>Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 20%</color>. Lasts for 8s, up to 3 stacks. Each stack duration is calculated independently.
When characters attack Burning opponents, their <color=#F39000FF>CRIT Rate is increased by 15% and their CRIT DMG is increased by 30%</color>.
